name: Santa of Red Town: A Paint the Town Red Fangame
name_original: Santa of Red Town: A Paint the Town Red Fangame
description:
Santa is having some trouble delivering presents.
Help him overcome obstacles, fight evil snowmen and were-reindeer while also snowboarding your way through a winter wonderland in a fan game inspired by the indie hit 'Paint the Town Red'.

This current version of the game is a little demo of  the first level to get some feedback and feel for the game mechanics and overall design.

Please note that this game was made from scratch over the course of ~6 weeks, so expect some bugs. 
Also there might be some references and insider jokes from the 'Paint the Town Red' community  not everyone will get.
If you consider joining the Paint the Town Red community, here's our Discord link:
https://discord.gg/gPwsaUd

Created and developed by Nico Lovell
Textures by Kersher and South East Games (Developer of Paint the Town Red)

Merry X-mas!
